context: thanks and to you too i liked Dumb and Dumber (1994) and Superbad (2007) I also enjoyed The Terminator (1984) and Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)

I have seen both and enjoyed them Thanks so much for your help Have a great day and goodbye!
resp: And for action-y Sci-Fi, you might like the classics Alien (1979) and Aliens (1986)
